traits.name: Fog Form
entries: The Living Deep Haze can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Deep Haze
entries: A creature who enters or starts its turn in the same space as the Living Deep Haze must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and gain one {@adventure level of contamination|DoDk|12}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Living Deep Haze makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.
